PERSONA.NAME: Cymbeline
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A pre-Christian King of Britain, father to Imogen

PERSONA.NAME: Cloten
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A vulgar son to the queen by a former husband

PERSONA.NAME: Posthumus Leonatus
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A gentleman, husband to Imogen, Cymbeline's adopted son.

PERSONA.NAME: Belarius
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A banished lord disguised under the name of Morgan

PERSONA.NAME: Guiderius
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Oldest son to Cymbeline disguised as Polydore (supposed son to Morgan)

PERSONA.NAME: Arviragus
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Son to Cymbeline disguised as Cadwal (supposed son to Morgan)

PERSONA.NAME: Cornelius
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A physician in King Cymbeline's court.

PERSONA.NAME: Frenchman
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Friend to Philario, debates the quality of French women with Posthumus and Jachimo.

PERSONA.NAME: First Lord of Cymbeline’s court
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: He mocks Cloten for his idiocy.

PERSONA.NAME: Second Lord of Cymbeline’s court
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: He mocks Cloten for his idiocy.

PERSONA.NAME: First Gentlemen of Cymbeline’s court
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: He exposes Posthumus's marriage to Imogen.

PERSONA.NAME: Second Gentlemen of Cymbeline’s court
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: He exposes Posthumus's marriage to Imogen.

PERSONA.NAME: First Apparition of Brother of Sicilius Leonatus
Second Apparition of Brother of Sicilius Leonatus
Jupiter
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: The king of the Greek gods, god of the sky and thunder.

PERSONA.NAME: Imogen
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Daughter to Cymbeline by a former Queen, disguises herself as Fidele.

PERSONA.NAME: Dutchman
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Debates the quality of Dutch women with Posthumus and Jachimo.

PERSONA.NAME: Spaniard
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Debates the quality of Spanish women with Posthumus and Jachimo.
